API Reference

Complete documentation for all Soledgic API endpoints. Double-entry accounting, revenue splits, creator payouts, and CPA-ready reports—all via REST API.

18 endpointsLast updated: December 2025

Base URL

https://api.soledgic.com/v1
Authentication →

Jump to Section

Recording TransactionsInvoicing & ARCreator & Contractor ManagementFinancial ReportsPeriod & ReconciliationWebhooks & Events

Recording Transactions

Create immutable ledger entries with automatic double-entry bookkeeping

EndpointDescriptionUse Case
POST/record-saleRecord sale with automatic revenue split calculationMarketplaces & Platforms
POST/record-expenseTrack expenses with IRS category mappingAll Businesses
POST/record-incomeRecord non-sale income (interest, refunds received)All Businesses
POST/record-refundProcess customer refund with split reversalMarketplaces & E-commerce
POST/reverse-transactionVoid a transaction with correcting entriesError Correction

Invoicing & AR

Create invoices, track payments, and manage accounts receivable

EndpointDescriptionUse Case
POST/invoicesCreate, send, and manage invoicesB2B & Services
GET/ar-agingAccounts receivable aging reportCollections & Cash Flow
GET/ap-agingAccounts payable aging reportCash Flow Planning

Creator & Contractor Management

Track balances and process payouts for creators, contractors, and vendors

EndpointDescriptionUse Case
POST/process-payoutPay creators with balance validation and fee handlingMarketplaces & Platforms
GET/get-balanceGet available balance (ledger minus held funds)Creator Dashboards

Financial Reports

Generate CPA-ready statements and audit trails

EndpointDescriptionUse Case
GET/get-transactionsList transactions with date, type, and account filtersAudit & Reconciliation
GET/trial-balanceDebits = Credits validation reportAccountants & CPAs
GET/profit-lossIncome statement with expense breakdownTax Prep & Investors
GET/balance-sheetAssets = Liabilities + Equity statementInvestors & Lenders

Period & Reconciliation

Close accounting periods and reconcile with bank statements

EndpointDescriptionUse Case
POST/close-periodLock a month/quarter to prevent editsMonth-End Close
POST/reconcileMatch ledger entries to bank transactionsBank Reconciliation

Webhooks & Events

Real-time notifications for transactions and thresholds

EndpointDescriptionUse Case
POST/webhooksSubscribe to sale, payout, and 1099 threshold eventsIntegrations & Automation

Required Headers

HeaderValueRequired
x-api-keysk_live_xxxxx or sk_test_xxxxxYes
Content-Typeapplication/jsonYes (POST/PUT)
Idempotency-Keyunique_request_idRecommended

Common Parameters

ParameterTypeDescription
reference_idstringUnique identifier for idempotency. Use payment processor IDs (e.g., pi_xxx).
amountintegerAmount in cents. $99.00 = 9900
creator_idstringYour internal creator/vendor ID. Auto-creates on first sale.
descriptionstringHuman-readable description for audit trail
metadataobjectCustom key-value pairs (stored but not processed)

Error Codes

CodeMeaningResolution
200SuccessRequest completed successfully
201CreatedResource created successfully
400Bad RequestCheck required parameters and types
401UnauthorizedVerify x-api-key header
409Conflict (Duplicate)reference_id already exists—returns existing transaction
422Business Logic ErrorCheck error message (e.g., insufficient balance)
423Period ClosedCannot modify entries in closed accounting period
429Rate LimitedWait and retry with exponential backoff
500Server ErrorSafe to retry; contact support if persistent
